message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $95. I believe it offers excellent value at this price.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate it. I am willing to pay $88 for the product.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your position, but I'm looking for something closer to $90.  Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $91?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering my budget, I would like to propose $89 for the product.
